coded_answer.p: To the manager of the Circle Theatre.
I went to see Over the rainbow Show, Friday evening the 16/6. The musical had been advertised to beas London's newest and best musical, but all to my disappointment.

I had been looking forward to seeseeing my favoritefavourite actor Danny Brook, but he had been replaced by some other actor. I was not too happy about that and why didn't the theatreshow start when it was suposedsupposed to start? (45 min late), and where were the discounts which were supposed to be available? Your advertisement was fulfull of false advertising. In the endAt the end of the show I was looking forward to havehaving a nice dinner in the restaurant together with my boyfriend, but it was closed, because you were short of staff. This was not my perfect evening out. I want to have at least half of my money back. I hope you preciateappreciate my letter and that you'll try to improve the disadvantagesamend these problems./ Sally Svenssen
How has modern technology Changed my daily life?

The modernModern technology like the internetInternet, for example, has changed my life a lot both in good and bad ways. The advantagesadvantage withof the internetInternet areis that I can do all my shopping fromover the internetInternet. I don't have to stressmess around in the supermarket on a fridayFriday evening, when I'm tired from school, I just get all the groseriesgroceries I need delivered to my door. Instead instead. I buy all my clothes on the internetInternet as well and it works brilliantbrilliantly, but I have to admit that there are some disadvantages with the internetInternet too. I don't get as much exercise as I used to get. NowdaysNowadays I spend 2 hours intentin front of the computer every day, shopping or chatting to people. I have got friends over the whole world now. I'll go to Japan next month to visit one of my internetfriendsInternet friends. The modernModern technology openopens new and exciting ways for us. I don't think that I had beenwould be going to Japan if it wasn't because offor the internetInternet. InternetThe Internet has opened up a whole new world tofor me.
